After watching this movie, I couldn't help but notice the parallels between it and another film called America 3000. Both were very bad mid 1980's scifi movies that feature a girl who fantasizes about robots (like Wall-e) making her life better. In both cases she risks everything to escape into space where all of her one dimensional fears fall away revealing true love in its place.Another similarity between these two films is their director, Bob Weis.
